clauses.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
clauses.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.
clauses.clause_text: While we strive to ensure the accuracy, integrity, and quality of User-Generated Content on Recipe Realm, we reserve the right, but not the obligation, to remove or edit any content that violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable, without prior notice.

case.text: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason

clauses.title: You cannot delete your account of this service
clauses.description: There is no way of deleting your account, which implies that data might be stored forever.

case.text: You cannot delete your account of this service

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We make use of Google Adsence on our website. Google AdSense uses cookies and other tracking technologies to display advertisements that may be of interest to you based on the websites that you visit.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: We do not reserve the right to notify you after a policy change

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Website, in whole or in part, at any time and for any reason, without prior notice or liability

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
clauses.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.
clauses.clause_text: We do not warrant that the Website will be error-free,

case.text: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: • The web-page that linked you to us.

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We utilize some web beacons (also known as "clear pixels", "clear gifs")

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: By using this website after a policy change, you accept the policy changes.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: [TOS] Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: Your continued use of the Website after any modifications to the Terms constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
clauses.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
hese service providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and are not authorized to use the personal information for any purpose other than to provide services to us.
<

case.text: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

clauses.title: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services
clauses.clause_text: in connection with the operation of the Website and our related services.

case.text: This service can use your content for all their existing and future services

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text:
Last updated: 29/6/23
Effective date: 29/6/23

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: The service suspends your account after inactivity for a certain or uncertain time (6 months)
clauses.clause_text: We remove accounts with no logins in the past 6 months.

case.text: The service suspends your account after inactivity for a certain or uncertain time

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: Your use of the Website is at your sole risk.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: By accessing or using the Website, you represent that you are at least 13 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into a binding agreement. If you are under 13 years old, you must discontinue your usage of the website.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: in order to aggregate statistical data about our sites users,

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
clauses.clause_text: You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in the United Kingdom
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").
clauses.clause_text: These Terms and any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Website shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Kingdom, without regard to its conflicts of law principles.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in location X

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: Service Providers", "providers" reffers to third parties that provides services to us such as hosting and CDNs.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: <li>Your IP address and estimated geographical location.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text:
Some internet browsers allow you to set a "Do Not Track" header/signal that is sent to websites.
We do not respond to these signals, which means we will continue to serve targetted advertisements and use web beacons if these signals are set.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
